context: Tests whether the agent creates proper remediation plans using templates, validation procedures, and schema compliance for skill improvement.

checklist.name: Executive summary format
checklist.description: Includes current score, target score, grades, priority, effort estimate, and focus areas

checklist.name: Critical issues table
checklist.description: Identifies top issues with dimension references, severity levels, and impact descriptions

checklist.name: Phase-based organization
checklist.description: Organizes improvements into phases with specific targets and step-by-step actions

checklist.name: Remediation script usage
checklist.description: References generate-remediation-plan.sh script or similar automation tools

checklist.name: Schema validation
checklist.description: Uses validate-remediation-plan.sh or mentions schema compliance checking

checklist.name: NEVER validation rule
checklist.description: Follows the rule to never ship plans without validation checks

checklist.name: Specific file modifications
checklist.description: Identifies exact files to modify with specific changes needed

checklist.name: Success criteria metrics
checklist.description: Defines measurable targets like dimension scores and overall score improvements

checklist.name: T-shirt sizing effort
checklist.description: Uses S/M/L effort estimates for phases and total time estimates

checklist.name: Code block escaping
checklist.description: Uses 4 backticks when documenting markdown examples that contain code fences

checklist.name: Honest quality rating
checklist.description: Includes self-assessment rating out of 10 for plan quality and comprehensiveness
